short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A TON Wallet in your Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extended wallet on the open network, integrating features of memelinks and PayFi.
YepWallet is a simple and convenient wallet for storing, sending, and receiving Toncoin on the open network, which is a powerful new blockchain offering unprecedented transaction speed and throughput, while also providing a robust programming environment for smart contract applications.
YepWallet is an open-source, non-custodial wallet. By simply noting down the secret recovery phrase generated by Tonkeeper, you can start transacting, sending, and receiving Toncoin immediately.
TON is a network designed specifically for speed and throughput. The fees are significantly lower than other blockchains, and transactions are confirmed within seconds.

The YepWallet plugin also converts the corresponding URLs on Twitter pages into the user’s Web3 interface.

YepWallet analyzes the corresponding URL on the page, generates an appropriate operation interface, sends the user’s operation request to the relevant website’s API, receives the transaction data returned by the API, and uses tools like ethers.js and solana-web3.js to call the corresponding wallet, helping users complete transactions.
